objects.name: Crate
objects.description: Loot crate with transparent reward system showing drop rates and guaranteed item selection after 10 attempts.
objects.special_rules: Transparent Reward Pool: Displays % drop rates, allows item selection after 10 attempts.

objects.name: Battle Pass
objects.description: Localized Battle Pass with culturally relevant themes such as Carnaval Pass, Dia de Muertos Pass, Copa de la Liga Pass.
objects.special_rules: Each pass lasts 4 weeks, includes exclusive skins and event badges. UI changes based on national events.

objects.name: AI Skin Hub
objects.description: System allowing players to create and share skins using AI prompts.
objects.special_rules: Players can generate or publish skins using AI Tokens, purchase Premium Canvas for rare effects.

objects.name: Tank Crew Club
objects.description: Rebranded VIP membership offering cosmetic bonuses and time-saving perks.
objects.special_rules: Includes +10% EXP & Coin, weekly Crew Crate, exclusive voice lines/badges/decals, early access to event skins.

systems.name: Transparent Crate System
systems.description: A loot crate system designed to address player concerns about randomness by providing transparency and guaranteed rewards.
systems.mechanics: Displays item drop rates, guarantees item selection after 10 attempts, introduces Select Token accumulation for targeted rewards.
systems.objectives: Increase player trust, reduce complaints, maintain engagement through guaranteed progression and choice.
systems.source_note: Table Analysis: /Users/madeinheaven/Documents/GitHub/AI_Agent/output/monetization_module_tank_war_monetization_localization_latam/[Monetization Module] [Tank War] Monetization Localization (LATAM)/auto/images/b1efd190e559e9d63d27b690a53a2caa977a3e6b39287ff8c3fafd5b0a254b80.jpg

systems.name: Battle Pass System
systems.description: A progression system offering exclusive rewards and tasks tied to cultural themes.
systems.mechanics: 4-week cycles with exclusive skins, event badges, social media missions, UI changes based on national events.
systems.objectives: Drive periodic spending, enhance cultural resonance, foster community engagement.
systems.source_note: Table Analysis: /Users/madeinheaven/Documents/GitHub/AI_Agent/output/monetization_module_tank_war_monetization_localization_latam/[Monetization Module] [Tank War] Monetization Localization (LATAM)/auto/images/0c0bbfa4acbbd0d63d42cf1f0c45c21b8e1d1e1e84b5c591d9b1f4b6417133e0.jpg

systems.name: AI Skin Hub System
systems.description: A customization system enabling players to create and share skins using AI prompts.
systems.mechanics: Players generate skins using AI Tokens, vote for favorite skins, earn Creator Badges and special items.
systems.objectives: Foster creativity, encourage community participation, serve as a natural marketing tool.

systems.name: VIP Membership System
systems.description: A subscription-based system offering cosmetic and time-saving benefits.
systems.mechanics: Includes +10% EXP & Coin, weekly Crew Crate, exclusive voice lines/badges/decals, early access to event skins.
systems.objectives: Sustain monthly revenue, avoid pay-to-win perceptions, enhance player pride and belonging.

logic_rules.description: Display item drop rates in crates to ensure transparency.
logic_rules.effect: Drop rates are shown, and after 10 attempts, the player can select an item from the pool.

logic_rules.description: Integrate social media sharing tasks into Battle Pass progression.
logic_rules.trigger: Player completes a task linked to social media sharing.
logic_rules.effect: Player earns additional Battle Points for completing the task.

logic_rules.description: Allow community voting for AI-generated skins.
logic_rules.effect: Top-voted skin receives 'Creator Choice' tag, top 100 most-used skins earn Creator Badges and special items.

logic_rules.description: Provide exclusive benefits to Tank Crew Club members.
logic_rules.trigger: Player subscribes to Tank Crew Club.
logic_rules.effect: Player gains +10% EXP & Coin, weekly Crew Crate, exclusive voice lines/badges/decals, early access to event skins.
